nodes.text: The Black Sun captain worked for Czethros, a criminal mastermind involved in the Black Sun criminal organization. The captain was involved in Czethros' attempted takeover of the Spice Mines of Kessel. He pretended to have an amateur interest in New Republic history, and consequently to meet hero Nien Nunb, survivor of the Battle of Endor, face to face. When the Sullustan came down to meet the captain, he was taken hostage and the takeover commenced.
